title: About Me
description: My journey as a designer and developer.
content:

With over a decade of experience in the industry, I've had the privilege of working with clients ranging from startups to established enterprises. My approach is rooted in minimalism and clarity. I believe that great design should be invisibleâ€”it should serve the user without drawing attention to itself. Every project I undertake is guided by this principle, ensuring that form always follows function. When I'm not designing or coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, reading about design philosophy, or enjoying a quiet moment with a good cup of coffee.",image:"/images/profile.jpg"}),"

In a world cluttered with noise, I strive to create digital spaces that are calm, focused, and purposeful. My work is guided by three core principles:"})})}),i(s,{title:"CLARITY",children:i(r.p,{children:"Every element should have a clear purpose. If it doesn't serve the user, it doesn't belong."})}),i(s,{title:"FUNCTION",children:i(r.p,{children:"Form follows function. Beautiful design is useless if it doesn't work seamlessly."})}),i(s,{title:"RESTRAINT",children:i(r.p,{children:"Less is more. The best solutions often come from knowing what to leave out."})})]}),"
